captions.text:
The wind is so nice 
It soothes me

I lit the fire inside my heart again 
I walk along with it

There are many new roads 
Which one should I take

If I walk down wherever 
I feel like I'll know then
The flutter towards new world

I open heaven's door 
because of its sweetness like honey

I am walking down a unknown road 
following you

Will I open the door when I see the 
heaven's door
I want to find my real answer

The way to go is still long 
I really like this journey

Among the fluttering heart 
Nervous feeling sets in

If I walk down what's given 
I feel like I'll know then

My heart flutters after 
a long wandering

Because of the soft 
feelings like a dream
I open heaven's door

I am walking down a unknown road 
following you

Will meet you if 
I open heaven's door

I want to find my 
real answer
I want to find my real answer

At the end of this road 
When I stand next to you

Can I expect myself to be 
a little bit more grown

How would it feel to be 
part of your world

I see the light's of 
heaven again

I am walking down a unknown road 
following you

Will meet you if 
I open heaven's door

I want to find my 
real answer
I open heaven's door

I am walking down a unknown road 
following you

Will meet you if 
I open heaven's door

I want to find 
my real answer
